about_the_game:
By adding the Starter Pack to your account, you will show your appreciation for all things Hypatia and unlock the following benefits:

  • 1000 Hypatia Coins to spend as you see fit in Hypatia's many stores
  • Immediately unlock the Blockbot Avatar set (Head, Body, Pod, & Hand)
  • Exclusive Rainbow skin for each Blockbot part
  • Exclusive Shiny Cat! A limited edition shiny version of the classic Cat Plushy

We may add to this list at a later date, in which case you will get any additional items for free immediately!
detailed_description:
By adding the Starter Pack to your account, you will show your appreciation for all things Hypatia and unlock the following benefits:

  • 1000 Hypatia Coins to spend as you see fit in Hypatia's many stores
  • Immediately unlock the Blockbot Avatar set (Head, Body, Pod, & Hand)
  • Exclusive Rainbow skin for each Blockbot part
  • Exclusive Shiny Cat! A limited edition shiny version of the classic Cat Plushy

We may add to this list at a later date, in which case you will get any additional items for free immediately!
name: Hypatia - Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 4GB / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vive required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vive required

short_description: Hypatia - Starter Pack unlocks an exclusive item, an extra starting avatar set and exclusive skin for that set, as well as 1000 coins!
